String.string: The mekonaris and nagas are allied!
Talk with Penucha on the second level of the Ecdysi Atrium.
Talk with Trikaian on the second level of the Ecdysi Atrium.
Get oaths of alliance from the mekonaris in the Chamber of Mighty Souls.
Bring the oaths of alliance to Trikaian.
Find Darim on the third level of the Ecdysi Atrium.
